trans-unit.source: Represents a segment of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en del av en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from PathSegment, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>, represent specific types of geometric segments.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra PathSegment, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>, og <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>, representere bestemte typer geometrisk segmenter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because PathSegment objects inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, they provide several special features: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Freezable funksjoner:** fordi PathSegment objekter arve fra den <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>klassen de har flere spesielle funksjoner: de kan er deklarert som delt mellom flere objekter, skrivebeskyttet å forbedre ytelsen, klone og gjort sikker.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features that are provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om de ulike funksjonene som tilbys av <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter, se [oversikt over Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> ved å gjøre dype kopier av verdiene.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å kunne endres kopiere skrivebeskyttet <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings although they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoden kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger selv om de ikke kan løses.

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Den kopierer ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres dype kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *>-egenskapen for det klonede objektet returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om den <> </> *> egenskapen for datakilden<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> object by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> -objektet ved å lage dype kopier av verdiene.

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kopierer ikke refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner, selv om det kopiere gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å kunne endres kopiere skrivebeskyttet <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres dype kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om den <> </> *> egenskapen for datakilden er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the join between this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> and the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is treated as a corner when it is stroked with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om sammenkobling mellom dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> og forrige <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> behandles som et hjørne når den er streket med en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the join between this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> and the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is not to be treated as a corner; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sammenkobling mellom dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> og forrige <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> ikke skal behandles som en hjørne; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the segment is stroked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om segmentet streket.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> object has this property set to `true`, that object contributes to the stroked area of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> when rendered by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>objektet har egenskapen satt til `true`, objektet bidrar til området stroked i den <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>ved gjengitt av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, the extra area added by a Pen affects hit testing and explicit operations to widen the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er `true`, ekstra området lagt til av en penn påvirker nådde testing og eksplisitt operasjoner for å utvide <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: When you switch between stroked and non-stroked <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> sections in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, it is considered the same as the dashes of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Når du bytter mellom streket og ikke streket <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>delene i et <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>anses lik bindestreker av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> object determines the shape of the ends of stroked <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> objects.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>objektet bestemmer formen på slutten av streket <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the segment is stroked when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> is used to render the segment; otherwise, the segment is not stroked.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis segmentet streket når en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref> brukes til å gjengi segmentet; ellers segmentet ikke streket.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
